    Finding and extracting values and indices Changing vectors and values: Replace, Add/Subtract, Trim, Pad

Trim vector by index

Source: R/invictor.R
trimmers.Rd

Trim vector by index

Trim vector front

Trim vector rear

Trim vector front + rear

Usage

x %[-% i

x %-]% i

x %[-]% j

Arguments

x

A vector

i

A 1 element vector by which the rear of x will be trimmed

j

A one, or two element numeric vector. One element: Trim front by floor(i/2) and rear by ceiling(i/2). Two elements: Trim i[1] from the front and i[2] from the rear.

Value

A trimmed version of x

Examples


x <- rnorm(100)

# Trim front
x%[-%5
#>  [1] -2.355472992  0.689538137 -1.643140762  0.624351705  1.285747004
#>  [6] -0.499730613 -0.839134161  0.288671251  0.009621024 -0.743901451
